current_blocker: Physical appliance needs v52 disk image flash (user downloading 20GB)

active_tasks.note: Need physical appliance running from disk image first

active_tasks.task: Flash physical appliance with v52 disk image

completed_this_session: Built v52 disk image with auto-install service
Fixed healing orders bug - orders table vs admin_orders table mismatch
Identified VM disk_space issue: ISO boot = read-only squashfs, can't prune
Physical appliance GRUB bricked during A/B update attempt - need fresh flash

recent_commits.message: fix: Connect healing orders to appliance order polling
fix: Remove dry_run mode and add circuit breaker for healing loops

key_findings.healing_orders_bug: Incidents created orders in 'orders' table, appliances polled 'admin_orders' - now fixed
key_findings.vm_disk_space: VM runs from ISO (squashfs read-only) - nix-collect-garbage cannot free space
key_findings.disk_image_advantage: Disk image has ext4 root where pruning works properly

quick_commands.tests: cd packages/compliance-agent && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/ -v --tb=short
